body: Am I allowed to create a LFM that is non Avicus related Material? i.e a CoD team?
body_tagged: Am I allowed to create a LFM that is non Avicus related Material? i.e a CoD team?
title: Question!

replies.body: Maybe if it was under off topic, but it's kind of unnecessary.. Definitely don't make it under the teams section.
replies.body_tagged: Maybe if it was under off topic, but it's kind of unnecessary.. Definitely don't make it under the teams section.

replies.body: Oh yah, Obviously under Off topic, But for example, BattleField doesn't have a Forum, nor CoD etc
replies.body_tagged: Oh yah, Obviously under Off topic, But for example, BattleField doesn't have a Forum, nor CoD etc
